tool_description: Analyzes the emotional tone and sentiment of customer feedback to identify positive, negative, and neutral opinions.

feedback_text.description: Array of feedback text to analyze for sentiment

analysis_depth.description: Depth of analysis: basic, detailed, emotional

error_messages: Empty input: Provide at least one feedback text entry for sentiment analysis.
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [basic, detailed, emotional].
Text too short: Feedback entries must contain sufficient text for reliable sentiment analysis.
usage: Input feedback text array and choose analysis depth. The tool returns sentiment scores and classifications for each entry.

sentiment_labels.description: Sentiment classification for each feedback (positive, negative, neutral)

sentiment_scores.description: Numerical sentiment scores ranging from -1.0 to 1.0

overall_sentiment.description: Overall sentiment summary across all feedback
